duties_responsibilities.duty: Continuous building out, maintaining, and troubleshooting rapidly expanding infrastructure including Office 365, Azure, VMware, Data backup Environment, Anti-virus, SAN environment, Email System, etc.
Develop and maintain standard operating procedures (SOP) documents for System Architecture Solutions.
Implement projects to meet TS goals and objectives. Provide reports and metrics to support operational requirements for performance analysis and growth planning.
Manage implementation, configuration, and ongoing support of the System Architecture solutions. Establish Preventive Maintenance (PM) schedules and monitor their completion.
Provide technical support and guidance to staff and contractors. Analyze and resolve enterprise system hardware and software problems for 24x7 support.
Perform other similar and related duties as required or directed.

education_certification.credential: B.S. in Engineering, Electronics, Computer Science, or a closely related field OR High School Diploma with minimum 5 years of related experience working in an environment with specified technologies.
